meanings.definition: Thrombokinase: an enzyme that catalyzes the conversion of prothrombin to thrombin in the blood clotting process.
meanings.sent1: The thrombokinase helped in changing prothrombin to thrombin.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the role of thrombokinase in blood clotting.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous thrombokinase decided to turn prothrombin into a magician named thrombin.
meanings.sent4: The thrombokinase worked like a key, unlocking the door to clot formation.
meanings.sent5: In the body's drama, thrombokinase plays the crucial role of the clotting catalyst.
